resources.string: Robotomator needs accessibility permissions to automate tasks on your phone. This allows the app to read screen content, tap buttons, type text, and navigate between apps on your behalf.\n\nYour privacy is important: Robotomator only acts when you explicitly run an automation. Screen content is processed locally and only sent to AI services with your consent.

To automate tasks on your phone, Robotomator needs accessibility permission. This allows the app to read screens, tap buttons, and navigate apps on your behalf.\n\nTap the button below to open Settings, then find and enable \"Robotomator Automation\".
